channel.title: Zac on Zombie Apocalypse Tech
channel.description: Recent content in Zac on Zombie Apocalypse Tech

item.title: ZACLOG/000 - The Zombie Apocalypse Computer
item.description:
ZAC is a self-contained, open-source survival computer designed to function completely off-grid.

Built around a Raspberry Pi 5 architecture, ZAC lives in a weatherproof Pelican case. Solar and battery powered. No internet required. No cloud dependencies. No subscriptions. A standalone, civilization-in-a-box machine constructed to outlast the zombie apocalypse.
